name: Warhammer 40,000: Carnage
description:
All New Playable Character, Exclusive Missions and New Flamer Weapons!

New and Improved Fireteams! Easy to find and recruit your Friends.

Run and gun through screaming hordes of frenzied enemies in this fast-moving, high powered, action side-scroller. Jump into the kick-ass Warhammer 40,000 universe, obliterating infernal Orks in this stunning world.

This lightning fast blood bath will push your iPad or iPhone to it’s limits so make sure that you’re running a iPhone 4S, iPad 2, or iPod 5th or better. Roadhouse has brought an incredible console-quality action side-scroller to your Apple device.

Warhammer 40,000: Carnage is built for anyone who loves fast action, and destroying stuff, and lots of it!!

FIVE SPACE MARINE CHAPTERS
Collect, unlock or earn up to five different playable Space Marines. Each character starts with exclusive campaign missions.

ULTRAMARINE
BLOOD ANGEL
DARK ANGEL
SPACE WOLF
SALAMANDER

BATTLE SUPPORT DRONES
Your Space Marine now has the help of a Support Drone! Choose from over 100 variations of Drones from 4 classes: Melee, Ranged, Blocking, and Healing. Collect Drones through drops, Supply Caches, and new characters. Earn elusive Blood Ore when you complete a mission with a friend’s Support Drone.

STUNNING MISSION DESIGNS AND GREAT REPLAYABILITY
Blast through the ever-changing world of Mithra. Up to 9 diabolically different ways to play each mission. Challenge yourself: experience heavy gravity, corrosive atmospheres, meteor storms and exploding enemies. Take on the epic Boss Battle, the MEGA DREAD.

‘HACK-N-SLASH’ CONTROLS
Simple tap controls guarantee effortless carnage, mayhem and destruction of all you survey!

500+ CLASSIC WARGEAR ITEMS
NEW Flamer Weapons!!! Massive amounts of classic Warhammer 40,000 Wargear, including Power Axes, Chainswords, Thunder Hammers, Plasma Guns, Grenades, and Jump Packs. Customize your Space Marine for maximum destruction.

REGULAR FREE CONTENT UPDATES
Battle through more than 70 missions across 3 maps. 5 more maps to come.

FIRETEAM MISSIONS 2.0!
New and improved Fireteam missions. We’ve made it easy to connect with your friends no matter where they come from. Connect and recruit you fellow battle brothers to complete the challenging co-op ‘Fireteam’ missions. Each mission earns you rare Blood Ore and a chance to get Epic gear.

NOTES:
- IMPORTANT: It is strongly recommended users update to iOS 7 before purchasing Carnage.
- Looks best on iPhone 6’s, 5S, iPad Mini Retina and iPad Air. And it plays amazing!
- Works on iPhone 4S, iPad 2, and iPod 5th Generation and above.
- PARENTS: you can turn off In-App purchasing in the iOS settings.
- Requires online connection to play

If you enjoy this game give us a quick shout out in the reviews - please don't hesitate to give it 5 STARS!
If you encounter any issue please contact us at carnagesupport@roadhouseinteractive.com

FACEBOOK
